steps.content:
In this course, you will learn how to create a wallet transaction log with no code. You need a Zapier account - https://grindery.io/zapier-web3-gateway , Google Sheets, and a crypto Wallet - https://metamask.io/ . In addition, make a copy of the wallet log template: https://grindery.io/wallet-log-template. For any questions, you can get in touch with us on Discord: https://discord.gg/vueMMKeC9g

You can also visit our website - https://www.grindery.io/ to learn more about us. To go back to the course page, click here: https://www.grindery.io/wallet-course

steps.name: Introduction to the course

steps.content: Learn how to detect a deposit of a native token on a single chain. a) Set up a Trigger - Grindery Web3 Gateway > Wallet (EOA) on EVM Chains b) Create an Action - Google Sheets Watch the next video: www.bit.ly/wallet_5 Watch the previous video: www.bit.ly/wallet_3 See how to add date to your wallet log: https://bit.ly/add_date Copy the help doc and template: www.bit.ly/wallet_log_template Get into Zapier: https://bit.ly/Grindery_et_Zapier Get support on Discord: https://discord.gg/vueMMKeC9g Visit our website: https://www.grindery.io/
steps.name: Detect a native token

steps.content: Learn how to convert a deposit amount (in WEI) to your specific token currency. a) Add an action: 'Formatter by Zapier' to do the conversion (an extension of Part 1). Note: You can get the decimals for conversion on Google Watch the next video: www.bit.ly/wallet_6 Watch the previous video: www.bit.ly/wallet_4 Copy the help doc and template: www.bit.ly/wallet_log_template Get into Zapier: https://bit.ly/Grindery_et_Zapier Get support on Discord: https://discord.gg/vueMMKeC9g Visit our website: https://www.grindery.io/
steps.name: Make token amount readable

steps.content: Learn how to detect the deposit of a native token on any of the supported chains. a) Set up a Trigger - Grindery Web3 Gateway > Wallet (EOA) on EVM Chains (select All Supported Chain). b) Create an Action - Google Sheets c) Add another 'Google Sheets' Action between (a) & (b) to get Token Symbol and Chain Name from Sheets. d) Add an Action 'Formatter by Zapier' between (c) & (b) to do the conversion. Watch the next video: www.bit.ly/wallet_7 Watch the previous video: www.bit.ly/wallet_5 Copy the help doc and template: www.bit.ly/wallet_log_template Get into Zapier: https://bit.ly/Grindery_et_Zapier Get support on Discord: https://discord.gg/vueMMKeC9g Visit our website: https://www.grindery.io/
steps.name: Extend to any EVM Chain

steps.content: Learn how to detect a transfer of an ERC-20 token on any of the supported chains. a) Set up a Trigger - Grindery Web3 Gateway - Tokens on EVM Chains b) Create an Action - Google Sheets c) Add an Action between (a) & (b) - Grindery Web3 Gateway > Tokens on EVM Chains > Token Information d) Add another 'Google Sheets' Action between (c) & (b) to get the Chain Name from Sheets e) Add an Action 'Formatter by Zapier' between (d) & (b) to convert the amount from WEI to token currency. Watch the next video: www.bit.ly/wallet_8 Watch the previous video: www.bit.ly/wallet_6 Get support on Discord: discord.gg/vueMMKeC9g Visit our website: https://www.grindery.io/
steps.name: Detect any ERC-20 token
